strategies.name: Git Flow
strategies.description: Robust model with dedicated branches for features, releases and hotfixes. Ideal for projects with defined release cycles.

strategies.name: GitHub Flow
strategies.description: Simplified model: main + feature branches with Pull Requests. Perfect for continuous deploy.
cons: May be limited for complex releases
strategies.bestFor: SaaS and projects with continuous deploy

strategies.name: Trunk Based Development
strategies.description: Everyone commits directly to main (or in very short branches). Focus on real continuous integration.
